data.name: Mars
data.description: Mars is the fourth planet from the Sun and the second-smallest planet in the Solar System after Mercury. In English, Mars carries a name of the Roman god of war and is often referred to as the 'Red Planet'.

curiosities.news: There is no evidence of life on Mars. However, it is the planet with the best conditions to support life.
Mars has north and south poles like earth.
Mars experiences violent dust storms powered by the sun which can last for months.
